A C F G I L P R S T

A

add(Throwable) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Adds the supplied Throwable to this ThrowableChain if it is non-null and not this ThrowableChain (a ThrowableChain cannot add itself to itself, because it already contains itself), or initializes this ThrowableChain's cause with the supplied Throwable if the cause has not yet been initialized.
add(Throwable) - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Throws UnsupportedOperationException when invoked.
add(int, Throwable) - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Throws UnsupportedOperationException when invoked.
addAll(Collection<? extends Throwable>) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Adds every non-null element contained by the supplied Collection of Throwables to this ThrowableChain.
addAll(int, Collection<? extends Throwable>) - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Throws UnsupportedOperationException when invoked.
asList() - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Returns a new unmodifiable view of this ThrowableChain.

C

clear() - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
clear() - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Throws UnsupportedOperationException when invoked.
com.edugility.throwables - package com.edugility.throwables
Provides classes and interfaces useful for working with Throwables.
contains(Object) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Returns true if this ThrowableChain contains the supplied Object.
containsAll(Collection<?>) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Returns true if all the elements of the supplied Collection are contained by this ThrowableChain.

F

firstInstance(Throwable, Class<T>) - Static method in class com.edugility.throwables.Throwables
Returns the first Throwable in the causal chain of the supplied Throwable (or the supplied Throwable itself) that is an instance of the supplied Class.

G

get(int) - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Returns the Throwable at the supplied index.
getAffiliatedThrowables() - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Returns a new List of this ThrowableChain's affiliate Throwables.
getRootCause(Throwable) - Static method in class com.edugility.throwables.Throwables
Returns the "deepest" cause reachable from the supplied Throwable.

I

isEmpty() - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Returns false, because a ThrowableChain always contains at least itself.
isEmpty() - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Returns true if this ThrowableList is empty.
iterator() - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Returns an Iterator that can be used to iterate over all affiliated Throwables.

L

lastInstance(Throwable, Class<T>) - Static method in class com.edugility.throwables.Throwables
Returns the last Throwable in the causal chain of the supplied Throwable (or the supplied Throwable itself) that is an instance of the supplied Class.

P

printStackTrace(PrintStream) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Prints the stack trace of this ThrowableChain and then of every Throwable affiliated with it.
printStackTrace(PrintWriter) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Prints the stack trace of this ThrowableChain and then of every Throwable contained by it.

R

remove(Object) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Removes the first instance of the supplied Throwable from this ThrowableChain's list of affiliated Throwables, provided that it is not null or this ThrowableChain itself.
remove(int) - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Throws UnsupportedOperationException when invoked.
removeAll(Collection<?>) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Removes all elements contained by the supplied Collection found in this ThrowableChain.
removeRange(int, int) - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Throws UnsupportedOperationException when invoked.
retainAll(Collection<?>) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Causes this ThrowableChain to keep all of the elements found in the supplied Collection and to discard the rest.

S

set(int, Throwable) - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Throws UnsupportedOperationException when invoked.
size() - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Returns the size of this ThrowableChain.
size() - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Returns the size of this ThrowableList.

T

ThrowableChain - Exception in com.edugility.throwables
An Exception (and an implementation of the Collection interface) that also holds a modifiable list of other affiliated Throwables that are not connected to the direct causal chain, but are related in some way nonetheless.
ThrowableChain() - Constructor for exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Creates a new ThrowableChain.
ThrowableChain(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Creates a new ThrowableChain with the supplied message and cause.
ThrowableChain(String) - Constructor for exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Creates a new ThrowableChain with the supplied message.
ThrowableChain(Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Creates a new ThrowableChain with the supplied cause and cause.
ThrowableList - Class in com.edugility.throwables
An AbstractList formed by a Throwable and its causal chain.
ThrowableList(Throwable) - Constructor for class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Creates a new ThrowableList.
Throwables - Class in com.edugility.throwables
A class to assist with processing Throwable instances.
toArray() - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Returns a new Object array of this ThrowableChain's contents.
toArray(T[]) - Method in exception com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableChain
Attempts to fill and return the supplied array with the contents of this ThrowableChain.
toList(Throwable) - Static method in class com.edugility.throwables.Throwables
Creates and returns a somewhat esoteric view of the supplied Throwable and its causal chain as a List.
toString() - Method in class com.edugility.throwables.ThrowableList
Returns the String representation of the Throwable that was supplied to this ThrowableList's constructor, or "null" if the supplied Throwable was null.
